name: National Botanic Gardens
description: A serene garden with diverse indigenous and exotic plants, perfect for relaxation and photography.

name: Mukuvisi Woodlands
description: A nature reserve home to zebras, giraffes, and antelopes, offering walking and cycling trails.

name: Lake Chivero Recreational Park
description: A popular spot for boating, fishing, and picnicking, surrounded by scenic landscapes and wildlife.

name: Kuimba Shiri Bird Sanctuary
description: A haven for bird lovers, showcasing over 460 species of birds native to Zimbabwe.

name: Harare Gardens
description: The largest public park in Harare, ideal for family outings and open-air events.

name: National Gallery of Zimbabwe
description: An art museum featuring contemporary and traditional works by Zimbabwean artists.

name: Ngomakurira Rock Paintings
description: Ancient rock art site with panoramic views, offering a glimpse into Zimbabwe's history.

name: Matobo Hills National Park
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site known for its unique rock formations and cultural heritage.
